string.name: navigation_header_avatar_desc
string.translation_description: Content description for the user's avatar image of navigation drawer header of main page.

string.name: navigation_menu_timeline
string.translation_description: The timeline menu item title of navigation drawer.

string.name: navigation_menu_notifications
string.translation_description: The notifications menu item title of navigation drawer.

string.name: navigation_menu_explore
string.translation_description: The exploration menu item title of navigation drawer.

string.name: navigation_menu_settings
string.translation_description: The settings menu item title of navigation drawer.

string.name: navigation_menu_about
string.translation_description: The about menu item title of navigation drawer.

string.name: main_menu_search
string.translation_description: The search menu item title of main page.

string.name: repository_name_unknown
string.translation_description: If it is unable to get a repository's name, then display this value.

string.name: programming_language_unknown
string.translation_description: If a repository does not have a programming language, then display this value.

string.name: user_profile_following
string.translation_description: The following count of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_followers
string.translation_description: The follower(s) count of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_stars
string.translation_description: The starred repository(ies) count of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_repositories
string.translation_description: The repository(ies) count of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_follow
string.translation_description: The button's content text to follow a user of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_unfollow
string.translation_description: The button's content text to unfollow a user of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_company_desc
string.translation_description: The content description of company image of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_company_action
string.translation_description: The copy action text of snackbar when click the company image of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_location_desc
string.translation_description: The content description of location image of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_location_action
string.translation_description: The copy action text of snackbar when click the location image of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_email_desc
string.translation_description: The content description of email image of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_email_action
string.translation_description: The sending a new email action of snackbar when click the email image of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_link_desc
string.translation_description: The content description of link image of user profile.

string.name: user_profile_link_action
string.translation_description: The open action text of snackabar when click the link image of user profile.

string.name: event_starred
string.translation_description: The action text when someone starred others' repository of timeline event list.

string.name: event_forked
string.translation_description: The action text when someone forked others' repository of timeline event list.

string.name: event_created
string.translation_description: The action text when someone created a new repository of timeline event list.

string.name: event_publicized
string.translation_description: The action text when someone make his/her repository public of timeline event list.

string.name: event_action_an_issue_in
string.translation_description: The action text when someone created/closed/assigned/... an issue of timeline event list.

string.name: event_action_a_pr
string.translation_description: The action text when someone created/assigned/... a pull request of timeline event list.

string.name: navigate_up
string.translation-description: Arrow at the top left of the screen for navigation

string.name: users_following_title
string.translation-description: Following list title of users page, for example: Tonny's following.

string.name: users_followers_title
string.translation-description: Followers list title of users page, for example: Tonny's followers.

string.name: repositories_owned
string.translation-description: The repositories list title when enter someone's owned repositories, for example: Tonny's repositories

string.name: repositories_stars
string.translation-description: The repositories list title when enter someone's starred repositories, for example: Tonny's stars
